about_the_game: My Ghost Pet is Zhong Kui "is a large-scale multiplayer online game. You can collect ghost pets in the game, create your own exclusive" Hundred Ghosts Record ", build a sect ghost mansion in the game, expand your territory, establish your own power, or become a casual player, farming, fishing, cooking, running businesses, setting up stalls, begging, and delivering packages. Each casual gameplay is creative and interesting, allowing you to immerse yourself in it. There are currently over 100 ghost pets set in the game, each with six upgrade forms, ranging from Soul level to Yang God level. Our combat system adopts an innovative gameplay of real-time turn based and auto chess, which not only requires players to match their pets, but also tests their skill combinations and casting timing. Filled with a sense of pleasure while also being strategic. A box court style open world, where various scenes that have appeared in the plot, as well as various areas in the Town Demon Tower, can be freely jumped. And the game will keep up with the pace of the novel, updating new maps and ghost pets every week, allowing players to freely explore this world.
